original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā uruvelāyaṁ viharati najjā nerañjarāya tīre bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā uruvelāyam viharati najjā nerañjarāya tīre bodhi rukkha mūle paṭhama abhisambuddhaḥ

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sattāhaṁ ekapallaṅkena nisinno hoti vimuttisukhapaṭisaṁvedī.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena bhagavā sattāham eka pallaṅkena nisinnaḥ hoti vimutti sukha paṭisavedī

original: Atha kho bhagavā tassa sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā buddhacakkhunā lokaṁ volokesi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā tassa sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā buddha cakkhunā lokam volokesi

original: Addasā kho bhagavā buddhacakkhunā volokento satte anekehi santāpehi santappamāne, anekehi ca pariḷāhehi pariḍayhamāne—
analyzed: addasā kho bhagavā buddha cakkhunā volokentaḥ satte anekehi santāpehi santappamāne anekehi ca pariḷāhehi pariḍayhamāne

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etam attham viditvā tāyam velāyam imam udānam udānesi

original: ‘Ye hi keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā bhavena bhavassa vippamokkhamāhaṁsu, sabbe te avippamuttā bhavasmā’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: ye hi keci samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā bhavena bhavassa vippamokkham āhasu sabbe te a vippamuttāḥ bhavasma ati vadāmi

original: ‘Ye vā pana keci samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā vibhavena bhavassa nissaraṇamāhaṁsu, sabbe te anissaṭā bhavasmā’ti vadāmi.
analyzed: ye vā pana keci samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā vibhavena bhavassa nissaraṇam āhasu sabbe te anissaṭāḥ bhavasma ati vadāmi

original: Upadhiñhi paṭicca dukkhamidaṁ sambhoti, sabbupādānakkhayā natthi dukkhassa sambhavo.
analyzed: upadhim hi paṭicca dukkham idam sambhoti sabba upādāna kkhayā natthi dukkhassa sambhavaḥ

original: puthū avijjāya paretā bhūtā bhūtaratā aparimuttā;
analyzed: puthū avijjāya paretā bhūtā bhūta ratā a parimuttā

original: ye hi keci bhavā sabbadhi sabbatthatāya sabbe te bhavā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammāti.
analyzed: ye hi keci bhavā sabbadhi sabbatthatāya sabbe te bhavā aniccāḥ dukkhāḥ vipariṇāma dhammā ati
